mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account_id AS "accountId", a.village_info_id AS "villageInfoId", a.news_type AS "newsType", a.content AS "content", a.order_type AS "orderType", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_news( id, account_id, village_info_id, news_type, content, order_type, order_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{accountId}, #{villageInfoId}, #{newsType}, #{content}, #{orderType}, #{orderId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member_news SET account_id = #{accountId}, village_info_id = #{villageInfoId}, news_type = #{newsType}, content = #{content}, order_type = #{orderType}, order_id = #{orderId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: (SELECT * FROM member_news WHERE news_type=0 AND del_flag!=1 AND account_id = #{accountId} AND village_info_id = #{villageInfoId} ORDER BY create_date LIMIT 1) UNION ALL (SELECT * FROM member_news WHERE news_type=1 AND del_flag!=1 AND account_id = #{accountId} AND village_info_id = #{villageInfoId} ORDER BY create_date LIMIT 1) UNION ALL (SELECT * FROM member_news WHERE news_type=2 AND del_flag!=1 AND account_id = #{accountId} AND village_info_id = #{villageInfoId} ORDER BY create_date LIMIT 1)
